wikipedia_page.main: Thomas P. Ryder (born 21 February 1985 in Nottingham, England) is a former rugby union player who played at lock, latterly for Yorkshire Carnegie in the RFU Championship.

response: Newark hosts Newark Rugby Union Football Club, whose players have included Dusty Hare, John Wells, Greig Tonks and Tom Ryder. The town has a leisure centre in Bowbridge Road, opened in 2016.
